meanings.definition: Extremely skilled or capable beyond normal levels.
meanings.sent1: She is a supercompetent student who excels in every subject.
meanings.sent2: The supercompetent doctor saved many lives with her quick thinking.
meanings.sent3: The supercompetent chef could turn a simple meal into a culinary masterpiece.
meanings.sent4: His supercompetent leadership skills guided the team to victory.
meanings.sent5: The supercompetent engineer designed a revolutionary new technology.

meanings.sent1: The supercompetent musician played the piano with incredible skill.
meanings.sent2: Her supercompetent presentation impressed everyone in the audience.
meanings.sent3: The supercompetent juggler could juggle anything, even eggs!
meanings.sent4: His supercompetent memory allowed him to recall every detail of the meeting.
meanings.sent5: The supercompetent artist painted a breathtaking masterpiece.

meanings.definition: Having a high level of competence or proficiency.
meanings.sent1: The supercompetent employee finished the project ahead of schedule.
meanings.sent2: She is a supercompetent swimmer, winning every race she enters.
meanings.sent3: The supercompetent mechanic fixed the car in record time.
meanings.sent4: His supercompetent writing skills made the article captivating.
meanings.sent5: The supercompetent teacher inspired her students to excel.
